channel.title: Critical Role
channel.description: The adventures of Vox Machina in podcast form.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Adventures of Vox Machina
channel.itunes:summary: Voice actor Matthew Mercer leads a group of fellow voice actors on epic Dungeons & Dragons campaigns. These familiar voices bring the audience into the full experience of D&D, allowing imaginations to soar as the characters embark on adventures. This is Critical Role!
channel.itunes:author: Geek & Sundry

item.title: Liam’s One-Shot: The Song of the Lorelei
item.description: "Join Dungeon Master Liam O'Brien as he takes his guests through a werewolf adventure in Wildemount! The Lorelei siblings return home to discover their castle ransacked, their staff murdered, and their father missing..." (With Laura Bailey, Erica Luttrell, Sam Riegel, TJ Storm, and Travis Willingham)

item.description: Vox Machina make their way through Whitestone Castle, lead by a new, unlikely ally, in hopes of rescuing Cassandra de Rolo. Battles commence, debts are settled, and secrets revealed as the group descends into the haunted catacombs...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 25 - Crimson Diplomacy
item.description: Vax finds himself alone in the clutches of the villainous Briarwoods! While the team rushes in to save him, they are joined by a mysterious tiefling named Lilith, a powerful wizard who is on the run from vicious bounty hunters. Can Vox Machina save both Vax and Lilith from their violent fates? With special guest player Kit Buss!

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 24 - The Feast
item.description: Percy reveals the full tale of his blood feud with the Briarwoods, leaving Vox Machina just one week to prepare. While half the team returns to Kraghammer to settle old debts, Vax acquires some new weapons, Percy forges a special surprise, and makeovers are applied to Trinket and Grog. Finally, the group makes their way to a fateful dinner with the sinister and mysterious Lord and Lady Briarwood…

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 23 - The Rematch
item.description: As Vox Machina prepares for their return to Emon, Grog demands a rematch against Kern to regain his honor, but the real battle is what occurs in the audience. Upon returning home, the group has an awkward encounter with a fan, but there’s no time to rest with bad news on the horizon…

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 22 - AraMente to Pyrah
item.description: Their trials behind them, Vox Machina is brought together within the walls of The Slayer's Take. Osysa congratulates them all and offers them the final branding that will seal their membership in the Take. Newly marked and happily reunited, the group decides to set out for Pyrah to find the Fire Ashari, escorting Keyleth on the next phase of her AraMente...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 21 - Trial of the Take Pt 4
item.description: The three members of Vox Machina and their Slayer’s Take companions make their way down into the tunnels beneath the Velvet Cabaret, pursuing their mercurial prey. The path is far from easy, but after a handful of harrowing obstacles are surmounted, the dwarven warrior, Thorbir, leads the hunting party into the the hidden lair of the elusive Rakshasa...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 20 - Trial of the Take Pt 3
item.description: Like their companions before them, Keyleth, Vax, and Tiberius make their way to The Slayer's Take. Arriving shortly after their friends' departure for the Vesper Timberlands, the trio are introduced to the rest of their own hunting party, and their mission. There within the very walls of Vasselheim itself, they are to track down and kill an elusive Rakshasa that has been preying on wealthy travelers. With a little poking about in the city streets, they conclude that their only thread of information leads to the Velvet Cabaret, an exotic establishment in the Quadroads District...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 19 - Trial of the Take Pt 2
item.description: Our unlikely collection of travelers press forward into to the frozen, hoary wilds of the Vesper Timberland, closing the last few miles between themselves and their prey. Rimefang, the dread white dragon awaits them, high above, within a blizzard-harried mountaintop. An intimidating pair of towering frost giants find them in the wood below, threatening to bring their quest to a end. Yet despite their mounting challenges, the party eventually finds itself standing before the great and terrible wyrm...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 18 - Trial of the Take
item.description: With the party now split due to requirements of The Slayer's Take, Scanlan, Percy, Vex, and Grog find themselves teaming up with an unlikely duo. Putting differences aside, the forced fellowship heads out into the frost-harried north of the Vesper Timberland…

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 17 - Hubris
item.description: Parting ways with their beloved cleric, Vox Machina is now adrift in a strange and unfamiliar city. With heavy hearts, they wander Vasselheim in the Braving Grounds District, home to the worshippers of Kord, the deity of battle and strength. Fittingly, Grog soon finds himself in a fighting pit, duking it out with as tough an opponent as he could ever wish for. Later, the party spots an attacking beast high on the city walls, and true to form, Vox Machina rushes to help. Following the fleeing creature off into the dense forests outside the city, they find their prey and a whole lot more...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 16 - Enter Vasselheim
item.description: The skyship finally touches down in Vasselhein, and Vox Machina set off on their task ahead: Enter the Hall of the Exalt, an ancient vault below the Sanctuary, to lay the Horn of Orcus to its final home. But this task proves much more complex than originally perceived, as the vault is home to a number of nasty tricks and traps...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 14 - Shopping and Shipping
item.description: After allowing themselves a single night’s rest back in the city of Emon, Vox Machina sets out for their meeting with the Sovereign Uriel and the Council of Tal’Dorei. Once the Council learns of the Horn of Orcus, the gathering quickly descends into squabbling over the fate of the dark artifact. A course of action is eventually decided upon and the party then heads out into the city to gear up for the mission at hand. Everyone knows the best goods in town can always be found at Gilmore’s…

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 13 - Escape from the Underdark
item.description: Vox Machina find themselves out of the frying pan and into the fryer as the Illithid force makes itself known, and an ally reveals their true intentions. Will Vox Machina manage to escape the Underdark?

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 12 - Dungeons & Dragons Campaign Tips
item.description: Join Matt Mercer as he walks aspiring GMs through some tips and tricks of the trade, then leads Dan Casey, Ify Nwadiwe, and Zac Eubanks through an entirely improvised one-shot!

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 11 - The Temple Showdown
item.description: This time around, Vox Machina finds themselves in dire straits. A tangle with a smelly giant paves the way for their next big test: the assault on K’varn’s temple. Who will survive this grueling battle?​

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 10 - K'Varn Revealed

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 9 - Yug'voril Uncovered
item.description: After a showdown with the Duergar Queen, the rescue of a comrade, and an unsettling message from the mysterious evil entity known only as K'varn, the party learns just what can happen when they go looking for trouble...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 8 - Glass and Bone
item.description: With two party members turned to stone and another taken captive by the Duergar Queen, the remaining members of Vox Machina struggle to survive. Low on health and options, they flee Emberhold and recoup their losses. But the group hasn't given up, and continue to push through the Underdark, guided by their Ranger Vex'ahlia, finding themselves on track to Pike's mysterious vision...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 7 - The Throne Room
item.description: With an uneasy agreement struck between Kima and Clarota, Vox Machina quietly begin a search of Emberhold. Lady Kima means to strike a blow against their unseen enemy by cutting off the head of K’Varn’s military forces. The party battles their way through the fortress and come face to face with the Duergar King and Queen themselves...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 6 - Breaching the Emberhold
item.description: The party continues to wind its way ever downward, far below Kraghammer, making their way toward the Duergar Fortress known as Emberhold. It looms in the dim light of the caverns and many magma flows, housing both secrets...and danger.

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 5 - The Trick About Falling
item.description: Having successfully slain a dangerous Illithid and its dwarven general, Vox Machina find themselves surrounded by a small army of Duergar. In their attempt to escape, Vox Machina quickly find things moving from bad to worse...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 4 - Attack on the Duergar Warcamp
item.description: Now tentatively aligned with the Illithid outcast, Clarota, Vox Machina learns more of the Illithid clan living deep in the mines, and the mysterious being that currently controls them. In order to free the clan, Vox Machina must proceed further into the deep, and reach the center of Clarota’s hive. But in order for the heroes of Emon to reach the Illithid city in the belly of Khaloor, they must get past the first flayer they encountered, as well as its small army of Duergar...

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 3 - Strange Bedfellows
item.description: Reeling from the loss of Grog's mind, Vox Machina gather their resources to restore 'intelligence' to their barbarian friend. Contining their journey deeper into the underdark, the group stumble upon Duergar and Illithids, finding danger...and potential allies...at every turn.

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 2 - Into the Greyspine Mines
item.description: After Scanlan Shorthalt brought the abomination of a Naga to its tortured end, Vox Machina vowed to Nostoc Greyspine to put an end to the darkness now bubbling up out of the bowls of the earth. The team quickly geared up and made their way into the mine, and began a miles long trek down into the veins of Khaloor. What dangers await them in the Underdark?

item.title: Vox Machina Ep. 1 - Arrival at Kraghammer
item.description: Our story begins as Vox Machina, the heroes of Emon, arrive at the cavernous underground city of Kraghammer. After wiping out a grave threat to Emon’s emperor, Sovereign Uriel Tal'Dorei III, the band of adventurers has been sent on a journey by the Arcanist, Allura Vysoren, to find Lady Kima of Vord, a Halfling Paladin of Bahamut, who was drawn to Kraghammer upon learning of a great evil resting beneath it...
